Indian Economy.title: Public spending can’t do it alone. India needs private investment now
Indian Economy.summary: India's economic growth stands out globally, yet private investment is not keeping pace. With public spending doing the heavy lifting, the big question is how to unlock the private capital and dynamism needed to boost India's economy.

Indian Economy.title: GST rate cuts, I-T relief to have multiplier effect on GDP, says CEA Nageswaran
Indian Economy.summary: Chief Economic Advisor predicts GST rate cuts and Income Tax relief will significantly boost GDP despite fiscal implications.

Indian Economy.title: AICTE Industry Fellowship Programme: Eligibility, finances, duration —All you need to know
Indian Economy.summary: Eligible candidates can apply through the official portal at ifp.aicte.gov.in until October 15. Selected faculty will serve as full-time industry fellows for a minimum duration of one year during the 2025–26 academic session.

Indian Economy.title: How Bihar is using night-time light to gauge its economic growth
Indian Economy.summary: A study by the Bihar government shows that while Patna, Vaishali, Muzaffarpur, Gaya and Begusarai at top five districts in terms of faster economic growth, Arwal, Jehanabad, Jamui, Banka and Madhubani are top five ‘emerging districts’.

Startups & Funding.title: Pfizer to buy obesity startup Metsera for $4.9 billion; shares jump on Wall Street — Details here
Startups & Funding.summary: Pfizer Inc. is set to pay $4.9 billion for the obesity startup Metsera Inc., as the pharma company plans to catch up with the rival drugmakers. Shares of both companies jumped on Wall Street at the opening bell after the corporate update.

Startups & Funding.title: Ola shrinks workforce in profit push even as Rapido gains ground
Startups & Funding.summary: Employee count at Ola’s parent ANI Technologies has dropped 57% since April 2024, even as rivals Uber and Rapido expand in India’s ride-hailing market..The SoftBank- and Tencent-backed firm is cutting costs as valuation falls and competition heats up.
